channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: ztable
item.description: ここでは ztable というパッケージを紹介する. 表を latex や html に変換するパッケージとして xtable が有名である. ztable はグループ化や色付けが簡単にできるパッケージであ

item.title: gapminder
item.description: R4DS の以下を mosaic を使って再現する. http://r4ds.had.co.nz/many-models.html#gapminder library(tidyverse) library(mosaic) library(gapminder) library(modelr) gapminder summary(gapminder) ## country continent year lifeExp ## Afghanistan: 12 Africa :624 Min. :1952 Min. :23.60 ## Albania : 12 Americas:300 1st Qu.:1966 1st Qu.:48.20 ## Algeria : 12 Asia :396 Median :1980 Median :60.71 ## Angola : 12 Europe :360 Mean :1980 Mean :59.47 ## Argentina : 12 Oceania

item.title: gf_line
item.description: R4DS の以下を mosaic を使って再現する. http://r4ds.had.co.nz/model-basics.html#formulas-and-model-families library(tidyverse) library(mosaic) library(modelr) Categorical variables sim2 %>% gf_point(y~x) mod2 <- lm(y ~ x, data = sim2) grid <- sim2 %>% data_grid(x) %>% add_predictions(mod2) sim2 %>% gf_point(y~x) %>% gf_point(data = grid, pred~x, color ="red", size =4) Interactions (continuous and categorical) mod1 <- lm(y~ x1 + x2, data = sim3) mod2 <- lm(y~ x1 * x2,

item.title: journal2
item.description: library(knitr) library(tidyverse) library(broom) library(mosaic) library(AER) データを次のように整形 data("Journals", package = "AER") journals <- Journals %>% mutate(citeprice = price/citations, age = 2000 - foundingyear, chars = charpp*pages/10^7) %>% select(subs,price,citeprice,age,chars) 基本統計量は以下のとおりである. inspect(journals) ## ## quantitative variables: ## name class min Q1 median Q3 ## 1 subs integer 2.000000000

item.title: dataframe
item.description: introduction 基本 変数 Rはオブジェクト指向言語とよばれる. オブジェクトとは, 値や関数などをすべてオブジェクトとしてひとまとめに扱うことができる言語である

item.title: time series
item.description: library(tidyverse) library(mosaic) library(AER) library(dynlm) library(knitr) library(broom) 時系列データからデータフレイムに変換 data("USMacroSW",package="AER") df <- data.frame(zoo::coredata(USMacroSW),time=zoo::index(USMacroSW)) inspect(df) ## ## quantitative variables: ## name class min Q1 median Q3 ## 1 unemp numeric 3.40000 5.00000 5.70000 6.833333e+00 ## 2 cpi numeric 27.77667 35.86666 87.93333 1.430667e+02 ## 3 ffrate numeric 0.93000 3.48000 5.40000 7.760000e+00 ## 4 tbill numeric 0.83000 3.50000

item.title: kable
item.description: library(tidyverse) library(AER) library(knitr) library(broom) library(stringr) library(xtable) 基本 分析を実行する. fm <- lm(dist ~ speed, data= cars) summary(fm) ## ## Call: ## lm(formula = dist ~ speed, data = cars) ## ## Residuals: ## Min 1Q Median 3Q Max ## -29.069 -9.525 -2.272 9.215 43.201 ## ## Coefficients: ## Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|) ## (Intercept) -17.5791 6.7584 -2.601 0.0123 * ## speed

item.title: stargazer
item.description: stargazerを紹介する. 計量経済学の基本の表を簡単に作成してくれる. 細かいカスタマイズはこのチートシートが参考になる. library(tidyverse) library(stringr) library(stargazer) 基本統計量

item.title: xtable
item.description: library(tidyverse) library(AER) library(knitr) library(broom) library(stringr) library(xtable) 基本 分析を実行する. fm <- lm(dist ~ speed, data= cars) summary(fm) ## ## Call: ## lm(formula = dist ~ speed, data = cars) ## ## Residuals: ## Min 1Q Median 3Q Max ## -29.069 -9.525 -2.272 9.215 43.201 ## ## Coefficients: ## Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|) ## (Intercept) -17.5791 6.7584 -2.601 0.0123 * ## speed

item.title: ggformula
item.description: ggformula というパッケージがある. https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ggformula/index.html ひとことでいうと, ggplot2 を lattice のように扱えるようにしたパッケージである. 詳しくは以下を参照. https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ggformula/vignettes/ggformula.html 自分の備忘録のために記録

item.title: random variable
item.description: set.seed(2017) library(mosaic) library(knitr) コインを20回投げる. rflip(20) ## ## Flipping 20 coins [ Prob(Heads) = 0.5 ] ... ## ## H H T T H H T T T T H T T T T T T H H H ## ## Number of Heads: 8 [Proportion Heads: 0.4] そうした行為を1000回繰

item.title: caschools
item.description: SW本8章の表8.3を再現する. まず以下のライブラリを導入する library(knitr) library(mosaic) library(AER) library(texreg) library(tidyverse) library(mosaic) またロバスト分散を何度も計算するため次の関数を作っておく. ## convenience function: HC1

item.title: figure
item.description: library library(tidyverse) library(knitr) library(broom) library(AER) library(mosaic) データを少し加工する. data("CASchools", package = "AER") CASchools <- CASchools %>% mutate(score=(math + read)/2, STR = students/teachers, HiEL = I(english>=10)) 図8.2 lm(score ~ income, data = CASchools) %>% plotModel() 図8.3 fm2 <- lm(score ~ income + I(income^2), data = CASchools) fn2 <- makeFun(fm2) plotFun(fn2, add=T, col=2) ## converting numerical color

item.title: iv
item.description: SW12章の表12.1を再現する. まず以下のライブラリを導入する library(knitr) library(mosaic) library(AER) library(texreg) library(tidyverse) library(broom) データ生成は以下のとおりである data("CigarettesSW", package = "AER") df <- CigarettesSW %>% mutate(tdiff=(taxs - tax)/cpi, rprice=price/cpi, rincome = income/population/cpi) df1995 <-

item.title: panel
item.description: library library(tidyverse) library(knitr) library(broom) library(AER) library(plm) library(texreg) library(mosaic) data data("Fatalities") df <- Fatalities %>% mutate(frate = 10000 * fatal/pop, vmiles = miles/1000, punish= factor(jail == "yes" | service == "yes", labels = c("no", "yes")), drinkagec=relevel( cut(drinkage, breaks =18:22, include.lowest = TRUE, right = FALSE), ref = 4)) head(df) %>% kable() state year spirits unemp income emppop beertax baptist mormon drinkage dry youngdrivers miles breath jail service fatal nfatal sfatal fatal1517 nfatal1517 fatal1820 nfatal1820 fatal2124 nfatal2124 afatal pop pop1517 pop1820 pop2124 milestot unempus emppopus gsp frate vmiles punish drinkagec al 1982 1.

item.title: mosaic
item.description: パッケージ mosaic がアップグレードされた. library(mosaic) model <- lm(length ~ width + sex, data = KidsFeet) l <- makeFun(model) l(width = 8.25, sex = "B") ## 1 ## 23.59689 gf_point(length ~ width, data = KidsFeet, color = ~ sex) %>% gf_fun(l(w, sex = "B") ~ w, color = ~"B") %>% gf_fun(l(w, sex = "G") ~ w, color

item.title: texreg
item.description: ライブラリ AER データ を用いる. library(AER) data("CASchools", package = "AER") データ加工したうえで幾つか選択する. library(tidyverse) library(knitr) df <- CASchools %>% mutate(stratio=students/teachers,score=(math+read)/2) %>% select(score,stratio,english,lunch,calworks) df %>% head() %>% kable() score stratio english lunch calworks 690.80 17.88991 0.000000 2.0408 0.5102 661.20 21.52466 4.583334 47.9167 15.4167 643.60 18.69723 30.000002 76.3226

item.title: texreg poly
item.description: 初期設定 library(tidyverse) library(mosaic) library(broom) library(knitr) Births78 %>% head(3) %>% kable() date births dayofyear wday 1978-01-01 7701 1 Sun 1978-01-02 7527 2 Mon 1978-01-03 8825 3 Tues bwplot(births ~ wday, data=Births78) bwplot(wday ~ births, data=Births78, pch = "|") mean(births ~ wday, data = Births78) ## Sun Mon Tues Wed Thurs Fri Sat ## 7950.943 9371.327 9708.808 9498.019 9483.635 9625.788 8309.327 cars.mod1 <- lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars)

item.title: test2
item.description: 日本語 plot(cars) \[ y_t=\alpha+\beta x_t + \epsilon_t \]

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

itle: gf_point uthor: Kenji Miyazaki ate: ‘2017-08-05’ lug: gf-point ategories: - R ags: - regression library(mosaic) 散布図に回帰直線を加えた式は次のようにすればよい. cars %>% gf_point(dist ~ speed) %>% gf_lm() これは以下と同様である. fn <- lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars) %>% makeFun() cars %>% gf_point(dist ~ speed) %>% gf_fun(fn, color = 4) 自乗項をつける場合には次のようにすればよい. fn <- lm(dist ~ speed + I(speed^2), data = cars) %>% makeFun() cars %>% gf_point(dist ~ speed) %>% gf_fun(fn, color = 4) 次のように男女別に色分けした散布図に回帰直線を付け加えることもできる.
